```{r}
library(nflverse)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(ggrepel)

```

```{r}
stats <- load_sharpe_games(2008:2023)
```

```{r}
PIT <- stats %>%
  filter(away_team == "PIT" | home_team == "PIT") %>%
  filter(game_type == "REG")
```

```{r}
away <- PIT %>%
  select(season, away_team, away_score, result) 
home <- PIT %>%
  select(season, home_team, home_score, result) 
```

```{r}
away <- away %>%
  filter(away_team == "PIT") %>%
  mutate(
 win = case_when(
  result > 0 ~ 0,
  result < 0 ~ 1))
home <- home %>%
  filter(home_team == "PIT") %>%
  mutate(
 win = case_when(
  result > 0 ~ 1,
  result < 0 ~ 0))
```

```{r}
away <- away %>%
  rename(score = away_score,
         team = away_team)
home <- home %>%
  rename(score = home_score,
         team = home_team)
```

```{r}
Tomlin <- rbind(home, away)
```

```{r}
Tomlin[is.na(Tomlin)] <- 0.5
```

```{r}
games <- Tomlin %>%
group_by(season) %>%
  summarise(
    wins = sum(win),
    points = sum(score),
    games = n(),
    team = team
  )
```

```{r}
games %>%
  mutate(winrate = wins / games)
```

```{r}
pbp <- load_pbp(2008:2023)
```

```{r}
steelers <- pbp %>%
  filter(posteam == "PIT") %>%
  filter(play_type == "pass") %>%
  filter(season_type == "REG")
```

```{r}
steelers <- steelers[-6729,]
```

6729

```{r}
epat <- steelers %>%
  group_by(season) %>%
  summarise(
    epa = mean(epa)
  )
```

```{r}
data <- games %>%
  rename(team_abbr = team) %>%
  left_join(epat) %>%
  left_join(teams_colors_logos) %>%
  mutate(winrate = wins / games) 
```

```{r}
data <- data[!duplicated(data$season), ]

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, mapping = aes(x = epa, y = winrate)) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = epa, y = winrate), size = 5) +
geom_text_repel(mapping = aes(x = epa, y = winrate, label = season)) +
geom_image(mapping = aes(x = epa, y = winrate, image = team_logo_espn), size = 0.05) +
ylim(0, 0.875) +
geom_vline(xintercept = 0.0) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0.5) +

theme_bw() +
  labs(
    x = "Passing EPA/Play",
    y = "Win Rate",
    caption = "Data from nflverse | Graphic by Alex McKeever",
    subtitle = "2008 - 2023 Regular Season",
    title = "Mike Tomlin is Always Above Average"
  ) +
    geom_label(
    label="Good QB Play", 
    x=0.175,
    y=0.25,
    label.padding = unit(0.4, "lines"),
    label.size = 0.15,
    color = "black",
    fill="#90D989"
  ) +
  
        geom_label(
    label="Bad QB Play", 
    x=-0.1,
    y=0.25,
    label.padding = unit(0.4, "lines"),
    label.size = 0.15,
    color = "black",
    fill="#DEA7E9"
  ) 
```
